Text.Page: Oh, what do the archdevas need this time? Don't they know I'm trying to look busy?

Well, if I'm going to make glue, I need deva horns!

Wait, have I done this already? I keep coming unstuck in time...

If only I could make some glue...
Why are you angry with me? You literally hold your own destiny in the palm of your hand!
I'm free! Free at last! For a limited time only!
